players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I have important information: Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out to protect the town."
Diana: "Charlie, that's a very bold claim to make right away. How did you get this information about Bob? Are you claiming to be the detective?"
You: "Charlie, accusing me so quickly seems like a desperate move. If you are the detective, why not share your investigation results instead of just naming me?"
Charlie: "I am the detective, and I investigated Bob last night. He is definitely the mafioso. We must vote him out now before he kills again."

You: "Charlie, your timing and eagerness to accuse me feels suspicious, as if you're trying to redirect attention from yourself. If you're truly the detective, why didn't you share any proof or previous findings before now?"

Diana: "If Charlie is really the detective, then we should vote Bob. But if Charlie is lying, then Charlie is the mafioso trying to get Bob eliminated. Bob, can you give us any reason to believe you're innocent?"
